      • linkTransform

        public static weka.core.Instances linkTransform(weka.core.Instances D,
                                                int j,
                                                int[] exl)
        LinkTransform - prepare 'D' for training at a node 'j' of the chain, by excluding 'exl'.
        Parameters:
        D - dataset
        j - index of the label of this node
        exl - indices of labels which are NOT parents of j
        Returns:
        the transformed dataset (which can be used as a template)

      • linkTransformation

        public static weka.core.Instance linkTransformation(weka.core.Instance x,
                                                    int[] excl,
                                                    weka.core.Instances _D)
        LinkTransform - prepare 'x' for testing at a node 'j' of the chain, by excluding 'exl'.
        Parameters:
        x - instance
        excl - indices of labels which are NOT parents of j
        _D - the dataset template to use
        Returns:
        the transformed instance
